data.comment: Steve Martin starts the match. Middlesbrough with the kick-off in London.
Steve Martin starts the match. Middlesbrough with the kick-off in London.
Ryan Colin Shotton (Middlesbrough) has received a yellow card from Steve Martin.
Goal! Paddy McNair gives Middlesbrough a 0-1 lead.
At The Valley, Ben Purrington has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Charlton kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Macauley Bonne is on a sub for George Lapslie for Charlton.
Lyle Taylor (Charlton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Adam Matthews for Charlton has been booked by Steve Martin and receives a first yellow card.
The home team have replaced Jonathan Williams with Alfie Doughty. This is the second substitution made today by Lee Bowyer.
Jonathan Woodgate is making the team's first substitution at The Valley with George Saville replacing Paddy McNair.
Tomer Hemed is replacing Ben Purrington for the home team.
Jonathan Woodgate (Middlesbrough) is making a second substitution, with Djed Spence replacing Marcus Tavernier.
That's full-time at The Valley. The final score is 0-1.
